Description: We are looking for a female home-massage therapist experienced in providing massage services for ladies & couples only.The ideal candidate will have experience providing more multiple types of massage types which include: Thai Massage, Balinese Massage, Deep Tissue Massage, Swedish Massage, Sports Massage, Lymphatic Massage and MaderotherapyTimings: 10am - 10pmCompensation package:Salary: AED 3,000 - AED 3,500 (depending on the level of experience)Visa & Accommodation included in the package:Required experience: Minimum of 3 years of massage therapist experience.Skills
